Foundation 5

Job Details

Architectural Technologist

Middlesex

Salary £30,000 to £50,000 + full company benefits

An award winning practice with an exciting array of current and future projects now has an opportunity for a Senior Architectural Technologist to join their Middlesex office. In this role, the Senior Architectural Technologist will run projects, liaising with planning & construction teams and working on the preparation of detailed drawing packages.

With a broad range of projects across the education and commercial sectors this is an excellent opportunity for a Senior Architectural Technologist to progress their career whilst working in an established practice with a reputation for staff development and quality design.

Apply

Architect

London

£40,000 - £46,000 per annum

Asnoy Recruitment has received an opportunity for an Architect to join our client in London on a permanent basis. Our client is a multi-disciplinary practice of architects, interior designers and property management specialists who focus on bespoke residential projects across the globe. Due to an expanding workload they are now seeking an Architect to join them on a permanent basis in their London office..

The ideal candidate will be able to manage and run their own project and will be to join the practice and hit the ground running confidently. This is a great opportunity for an experienced Architect to gain valuable experience working within a team of highly motivated industry professionals. Our client is offering an excellent salary package for this permanent position based in their state of the art London office.

Apply
